attributes.title: #removethisapp
attributes.review: i had the worst experience using this app. a picture of a piece of orange flan kept showing up everywhere. . also the racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist agenda was offensive and worrying. i could practically smell statutory rape and bronzer when i was in the app

attributes.title: My identity was ruined 🤬
attributes.review: Hi I name is echo the dog I am here to complain and tell my story. I downloaded this app because I thought I seen an ad that would give me millions of dollars if I download it so I did and of course I waited in the mail for a few days and it never came but then my foot started to turn 😱orange 😱and then my hands and my face and then after three weeks I was and orange 🍊 person I cried and cried and cried I never wanted to be a oompa lompa And because of that I was bullied I never wanted to go through that but this app turned me into a orange Oompa Loompa I expect Trump to pay compensation for the trauma I have been bestowed upon and if not then I will just write.A story about how I became like our dear PresidentA big Oompa Loompa...Now I must visit a therapist for times a weekCrying because of the trauma I would never get through I will never get over this I will never forget... Then my human downloaded the App and now she’s emotionally 🥺scarred and scared of the color orange oh because she seen Donald Trump naked body our color orange it’s now scary, scarred many people of America and I witness this tragedy So I would expect him to pay for my trauma and also my dogs expense of the psychologically damage she is.Love you our dear 🍊
